Release Type: PC Game

Language: English
 
#################################################

System Requirements:
Processor: Pentium - 500MHz or better
RAM: 128MB
DirectX Version: 7.0 or above
Keyboard and Mouse: Supported
Operating System: Windows XP/Vista/7/8
	
#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Hammer Heads Deluxe_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Stumpy and his friends are infesting your lawn. Break out the hammer and whack those gnomes silly. Tap their heads with your hammer but be careful not to miss! Build your skills to upgrade your hammer and destroy as many gnomes as you meet. Look for little hearts at 'Wacky's' feet to let you know how many times to hit her. Just when you thought it was safe to enter your backyard -- those pesky little gnomes seem to pop up everywhere. Take control before they overrun your yard and your life!
